results.title: Asphalt children...to all Sarajevians
results.brief_description: Vedrana is proud to be Yugoslavian, and proud to have been born in Sarajeva. To background images of Sarajeva, Vedrana reminisces about her childhood and growing up in the days of Tito - of her absolute belief in Yugoslavia where nationality did not matter. She asks “How could 1992 happen to Sarajeva, the most tolerant city in the world?”

results.title: Western stories: expressions for the future. Vol. 2
results.brief_description:
Western Stories: Expressions for the Future is an inspirational collection of works from young people who, through their association with the Western Chances program, have been given the opportunity to tell their stories and build their own bridge to the future.
Western Chances was established to ensure that financial hardship does not prevent a young person in Melbourne’s West from achieving their maximum potential in life.

results.title: Mrs Lemon Chicken
results.brief_description: This is a story about my grandmother. She lives with her dog Ruffy and her bird Harry. She loves to go to Vietnamese restaurants and the waiters named her Mrs Lemon Chicken.

group.title: Western stories: expressions for the future. Vol. 2

results.title: The Lucky country
results.brief_description: Bai Chan’s parents migrated out to Australia soon after they married in China in 1988. Here he reminisces about his parents’ family, life and culture in their birth country, China, comparing it to his own here in Australia.

group.title: Western stories: expressions for the future. Vol. 2

results.title: Life in horror
results.brief_description: Duy ever since a child has had an obsession with horror movies - they are his life and he knows them all. He has rules to avoid real life horror situations and his philosophy on life - live it to the max!

group.title: Western stories: expressions for the future. Vol. 2

results.title: Gilmore girl
results.brief_description: Moving house is one thing but changing schools is a totally different story. Anda talks about her journey to find her place, of moving house from St Albans to Yarraville and eventually back to St Albans, of leaving the old and familiar behind and having to confront a new school, new friends and an unfamiliar environment.

results.title: The Four musketeers
results.brief_description: Kevin and his three childhood mates share a bond that goes beyond friendship, a bond so strong that not even distance or marriage can break it. They are the four musketeers after all.
